title: My Education and Experience
body: I have listed my education and experience here

educations.title: Master of Management and Technology
educations.description: The Technical University of Munich (TUM) is ranked among the 25 best universities worldwide in several subjects.

educations.title: Bachelor of Business Economics
educations.description: O﻿ne of the best universities in Afghanistan.

experiences.title: Database and Application Manager
experiences.job_description:
* Designing and developing and managing databases and applications
* Discovering organization needs and providing a suitable solution
* Leading team to provide solutions based on organizational need
* Developing modules for each department and integrating them with other modules
* Writing documentation for all updates in the application
* Database maintenance and backup
* Develop a database for departments to facilitate communication and data centralization
* Troubleshoot hardware and software issues, and perform maintenance such as driver installation of manufacturing machines
* Test new technologies by reading their manuals
* Training users

experiences.title: Database Administrator
experiences.job_description:
* Configuration and setup of the Restaurant Application, e.g. eZee Burp
* Dealing with finance staff modules of the Application e.g. Payroll System
* Website content manager using WordPress 
* Applying suitable plugins for the website
* Customizations of the theme using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS
  Subtasks:
* Advising the social media department about how to increase attractions
* Social media advertisement

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.job_description:
* Managing and posting content
* Photography of products and uploading them to the website and social media pages
* Other IT tasks
